name: Clone Escape
description:
Help clones to escape from tiny dungeon by completing puzzles!

Made during the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 by redniksebaniy

Controls:

- Use wasd to move

- Click on clone to shift into them

- Use spacebar to kill yourself and everyone around you

Used assets:

"Dungeon mini-tileset" by Raou

"Pixel platformer pack" by Kenney

"UI pack" and "UI icons" by Kenney

"Kenney mini square" font by Kenney

Menu theme by HaecklAudio from Pixabay

Game theme by AleXZavesa from Pixabay

"Swing whoosh" sound effect by Joseph Levesque from Pixabay
